divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was driving towards Jamul on the Old 94 or Campo Rd I noticed a flying object out the drivers seat window. The object was zig zaging and moving unlike anything I seen before. Sparks were falling from the object and i thought is was a missle, an air plane possibly crashing, or Rudolph the red nose raindeer(i almost crashed watching this this thing). I stopped at the Jamul general store. Along with several bystanders, we all watched this amazing light. At this point I noticed there were two flying objects. The one that was sparking actually exploded. I heard the explosion as well as saw the bright light. The second object hoovered over us an seemed as it was flying down over out heads at a super fast speed. I actually jumped out the way i thought it was going to hit us. It just stayed over us for a while then in a matter of about 5-10 seconds, it looked like it flew into outter space. It was crazy. This was not something of this world. I believen in aliens and firmly believe this was a space craft.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Jamul
There were no other sightings in Jamul on or around December 24th 2007
